availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ralph C. Hagan (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Hagan. Father of John Hagan, Joseph Hagan, Mary L. Hagan, and Charles Hagan. Farmer in Nelson County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 254.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, Precinct 10, p. 139A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Nelson County, KY, August 1863, p. 199 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Ralph C. Hagan (26 Jun 1828-1 Mar 1911)," Memorial #6074819, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6074819 (accessed June 30, 2020).
